name: Ceaseless Descent
description:
Ever wondered what's at the centre of the Earth? Turns out it's nothing! You just keep falling endlessly. At least that's what happens in this scrolling shooter anyway. Dive down a chasm into the unknown, blasting or dodging anything seeking to stop your descent.

Might behave a bit strange in Safari browsers.

Any suggestions, bug reports, or other feedback is much appreciated.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/JordanReading_

-----

Update 1.1.0: Dive deeper than ever before with the addition of the Dark Abyss. Full change log below.
